product_entries.full_product_description: Supply, erection, fabrication, testing of MS black steel pipe Heavy grade of thickness 5.4mm conforming to IS : 1239 Part -1 including all fittings viz. Elbows, tees, flanges, etc. reduces clamps, MS support dash fasteners etc. including painting the pipe with two coats of approved primer and two coats of approved  paint. Pipe joints shall be grooved with groove coupling. All related civil work, supports etc shall be of vendor's scope. e 50 mm NB
